titleStmt.title: Some fruits of a tender branch, sprung from the living vine being a collection of several sound and godly letters, written by that faithful servant of God, Benjamin Padley. With diverse living testimonies to that innocent life, in which he walked, and continued to the end of his day.
titleStmt.author: Padley, Benjamin, 1658 or 9-1687.

notesStmt.note: Note: copy catalogued is cropped at foot, affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
